channel.title: Posts on Swastik Banerjee

item.title: About
item.description: "Life is Complex. It has Real and Imaginary parts." Hi, I’m Swastik, but you’ll often find me as justanotherlad on the Internet. I have been working as a full-time Software Developer at Wolfram Research since 2021. I have completed my undergraduation in Computer Science, with major in Information Technology. My primary interests are Algorithms, Cryptography, Discrete Maths and Music-making. I’m also trying to explore other areas of computer science and security.
